A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've never been so dissapointed in a movie (and i didn't expect it to be better than any of the originals either). It's not a bad move by itself\, but the writing\, plotting and tone are some of the worst of the series (and considering the prequels that's saying quite a bit). It saddens me to say\, i wish this movie didn't happen.
